price: 47. Ekosalaka bango mabe te, mpe ekolangwisaka te.
arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوۡلٞ وَلَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا يُنزَفُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā fīhā ghawlun walā hum ʿanhā yunzafūna
